briefdescription.para: Camera status callback, device available.
Camera status callback, device unavailable.
Camera status callback, device opened.
Camera status callback, device closed.
Camera status callback, device disconnected.
Camera status callback, device error.
Camera capture callback, capture started.
Camera capture callback, capture failed.
Camera capture callback, capture buffer lost.
Camera capture callback, capture progressed.
Camera capture callback, capture completed. Video capture will execute a capture completed callback every frame.
Camera capture callback, capture completed with settings results from the capture. A Video capture will cause this callback to execute on every video frame capture.
Camera capture callback, capture raw image available.
Camera capture callback, capture raw image available, parameters are YUVFrameInfo.
Camera capture callback, capture raw video frame, parameters are YUVFrameInfo and MLCameraFrameMetadata.

Raw video frame capture filter, this can be used to specify if the OnRawVideoFrameAvailableYUV callback will be passed all 3 YUV planes (RawVideoFrameData.IntensityAndColor) or just the Y (RawVideoFrameData.Intensity) plane.

Maximum number of raw video frames that are queued per Unity frame. If more frames are received than this number, the oldest frames are dropped. 1 is the default; this means only the most recent raw video frame will be sent to ther user per game frame. You can set this value to 0 to have no limit to the size of the queue, however, if it is not drained quick enough, you may run out of memory.
Count of the amount of raw video frames dropped last update that were beyond the currently set MaximumRawVideoFrameQueue.
Camera settings object for setting or getting camera settings
Camera Preview is enabled and texture is being rendered to
Texture that has the camera preview rendered to it when Previewing null when preview is not available yet.
Width of the internal camera preview texture
Height of the internal camera preview texture
static instance of the MLCamera class

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong metadataHandle, ref MLCameraResultExtras extra, IntPtr data)
memberdef.name: OnCaptureProgressedCallback

memberdef.argsstring: (ulong metadataHandle, ref MLCameraResultExtras extra, IntPtr data)
memberdef.name: OnCaptureCompletedCallback

memberdef.argsstring: (ref MLCameraOutput output, ref MLCameraResultExtras extra, ref MLCameraFrameMetadata frameMetadata, IntPtr data)
memberdef.name: OnVideoBufferAvailableCallback

memberdef.argsstring: (MLCameraCaptureType captureType, ref MLCameraCaptureSettings captureSettings, string filePath="")
memberdef.name: InternalSubmitCapture

memberdef.argsstring: (MLCVCameraID cameraId, ulong vcamTimestamp, out Matrix4x4 outTransform)
memberdef.name: InternalGetFramePose

briefdescription.para: Starts the Camera API.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to other internal error.

briefdescription.para: Connect to camera resource and register callbacks. Only one connection to the camera resource is supported at a time.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed to connect to camera device due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed to connect to camera device due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

briefdescription.para: Disconnect from camera resource and unregister callbacks.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

briefdescription.para: Captures an image from the camera and writes a jpeg to the specified path.

parameterdescription.para: Path to write the captured image.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericInvalidOperation if failed due to on-going video recording.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

briefdescription.para: Initiates a raw image capture request. Register to OnRawImageAvailable event to get result if format is JPEG. OnRawImageAvailableYUV to get result if format is YUV_420_888 If this function is invoked before the camera sensor has locked AE and AWB, it will be blocked until AE (Auto Exposure), AWB (Auto Whitebalance) is locked and then starts to capture. The capture itself is asynchronous

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericInvalidOperation if failed due to on-going video recording.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

briefdescription.para: Starts capturing a video to write as an MP4 to the specified path.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

briefdescription.para: Starts capturing video from the color camera. Frames are returned with OnRawVideoFrameAvailableYUV callback.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed due to internal invalid input parameter.

briefdescription.para: Stops capturing video. If initiated with StartVideoCapture(string) also write as an MP4 to the path specified with StartVideoCapture(string).

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to start video recording due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

briefdescription.para: Prepare a capture for manual submission, allowing modifying of the capture settings.

parameterdescription.para: The type of capture you will be submitting. This must match the capture type of SubmitCapture()
Structure containing all of the existing capture settings that can be viewed or modified. Must be passed into SubmitCapture

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed to prepare for capture due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericBadType if failed to prepare for capture due to invalid capture type.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to prepare for capture due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

briefdescription.para: Submit a previously prepared capture and execute the capture itself. If MLCameraCaptureType.Video is submitted, users must call StopVideoCapture() to stop capture at a later time.

parameterdescription.para: Structure containing the settings used for this capture
When captureType is of type Video or Image (but not ImageRaw), filePath must be a valid target path for the output capture

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericInvalidOperation if failed to capture image due to on-going video recording.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.MediaGenericUnexpectedNull if failed to start capture or recording due to null pointer.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if failed to start capture or recording due to invalid input parameter.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Timeout if failed to start capture or recording due to timeout.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to start video recording due to internal error.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.AllocFailed if failed to allocate memory.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.

briefdescription.para: Get camera intrinsic parameter. Requires ComputerVision privilege.

parameterdescription.para: Output structure containing intrinsic parameters on success.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if unable to retrieve intrinsic parameter.

briefdescription.para: Get transform between world origin and the camera. This method relies on a camera timestamp that is normally acquired from the MLCameraResultExtras structure, therefore this method is best used within a capture callback to maintain as much accuracy as possible. Requires ComputerVision privilege.

parameterdescription.para: Time in nanoseconds to request the transfom.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.PrivilegeDenied if necessary privilege is missing.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if outTransform parameter was not valid (null).
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if failed to obtain transform due to internal error.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent error code.

simplesect.para: Most recent MLCameraError.

briefdescription.para: Begin previewing the camera image for a live feed. StopPreview() must be called when finished Camera must be connected first with Connect()

parameterdescription.para: Texture reference that the live footage should be drawn on

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if the texture passed in is invalid (null)
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if some other failure occured.

briefdescription.para: Begin previewing the camera image for a live feed. StopPreview() must be called when finished Camera must be connected first with Connect()

simplesect.para: The texture that the live footage will be drawn on. null is returned if any errors occured

briefdescription.para: Handles correctly pausing and resuming the MLCamera API. This is includes, stop/resume capture, stop/resume preview, camera

parameterdescription.para: Texture reference that the live footage should be drawn on

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.InvalidParam if the texture passed in is invalid (null)
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if some other failure occured.

briefdescription.para: Stop previewing the live camera feed.

simplesect.para: MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.Ok if successful.
MLResult.Code will be MLResultCode.UnspecifiedFailure if you are calling stop without having already started previewing.

briefdescription.para: Cleans up unmanaged memory.
MLCamera class exposes static functions to query camera related functions. Most functions are currently a direct pass through functions to the native C-API functions and incur no overhead.
